videos.headline: O'Connell, Wright connect for 45-yard Purdue TD
videos.description: Aidan O'Connell takes his shot and finds Milton Wright for a 45-yard touchdown strike to extend Purdue's lead over Illinois.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (O'Connell, Wright connect for 45-yard Purdue TD) 2020/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Purdue increases lead on scoop-and-score TD
videos.description: Coran Taylor fumbles the ball and Jalen Graham picks it up in the end zone for a Purdue touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Purdue increases lead on scoop-and-score TD) 2020/10/31 ESHEET
